title: 98/1/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 18 December 1997 on a TACIS Civil Society Development Programme for Belarus for 1997
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 18 December 1997 on a TACIS Civil Society Development Programme for Belarus for 1997 (98/1/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The TACIS Civil Society Development Programme for Belarus for 1997 is hereby approved for a maximum amount of ECU 5 million.
The Programme shall be implemented by the Commission, acting in accordance with the appropriate procedures laid down in Regulation (Euratom, EC) No 1279/96, in particular Articles 6 and 8 thereof.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1997.
For the Council
The President
F. BODEN
(1) OJ L 165, 4. 7. 1996, p. 1.
